step_1.title: Yivi is an app for your digital identity
step_1.explanation: Your official name, birthdate, address, social security number and more. Safely stored in your Yivi-app

step_2.title: With Yivi you're in control over your data
step_2.explanation: Easy, secure and swift. You're in control of what you're sharing and with whom.

step_3.title: Securely on your phone
step_3.explanation: Only you can access the data on your phone. Nobody has access to your transactions, not even Yivi.

provide.title: Add e-mail address
provide.header: Link your e-mail address to your Yivi app
provide.explanation: An e-mail address allows you to remotely disable your Yivi app, in case your mobile has been lost or stolen

confirm_skip_dialog.title: Are you sure?
confirm_skip_dialog.explanation: Adding an e-mail address increases safety

confirm.title: Confirm your e-mail address
confirm.header: Our e-mail has been sent to:
confirm.explanation: It can take a few minutes until the e-mail arrives. Didn't receive our e-mail? Please check your spam folder.
confirm.explanation_extra_markdown: You have received an e-mail from **noreply@yivi.app**. Open the link in this message to link your e-mail address to your Yivi app.

terms_and_conditions.title: Our values
terms_and_conditions.explanation: With Yivi, you're taking back control over your online data and protecting your online privacy.
terms_and_conditions.point_1: You decide what data you store, and what you share.
terms_and_conditions.point_2: Your data only resides on your phone, safe and secure. Nowhere else.
terms_and_conditions.point_3: Nobody can see your data or your transactions, not even Yivi!

dialog.explanation: By enabling error reporting you're helping us improve the user experience. This option also allows your app to send us a periodic app status message. Of course, we do all of that without having access to your personal information or transactions.

types.blocked: Your Yivi app has been remotely blocked. This has either been done via MyYivi or because you did not use Yivi on this device for more than one year. If you want to continue using Yivi on this device, you will need to start over.
types.expired: The session has expired. Please start over.
types.pairing_rejected: The session was rejected. Please start over.
types.no_internet: Please make sure your device has a functional internet connection.

help.mail_error: Sorry, we can't open your e-mail app
help.question_1: What can I do with Yivi?
help.answer_1_markdown:
Yivi is a secure, privacy-friendly, and free mobile application. Yivi functions as a digital wallet that is filled with personal data. You can use it to log in to online services or to prove your identity. But always while sharing the minimum amount of personal data. Because Yivi empowers you to make that choice. What you store, what you share, and with whom. You're in control, always.

You don't have to remember account details and long passwords. Only your Yivi PIN code. And when sharing data you're only sharing the data that is needed, nothing more. Be it to order a package online or to make an appointment with your doctor.

Want to order a ticket online? With Yivi, you can easily prove that you're older than 18. And not share more details. Protecting your privacy in the process. You can also digitally sign documents with Yivi, using your personal attributes as a signature. You can sign as a civilian, a doctor, or with another role. Check the current overview to see the list of organizations that are already using Yivi.
help.answer_2:
Giving people back control over their online data is the mission of Yivi. What are you storing? What do you share? And with whom? Yivi empowers you to make that choice. With our app, you can decide what others learn about you. This data is shared from your phone with the requesting party, nobody else is part of that transaction. Not even Yivi.

Everything is stored securely on your phone, encrypted, and behind a PIN-code. There is no centralized data or cloud storage that contains your personal data. Lost your phone? Don't panic. Just remotely block your Yivi app. That prevents anyone from using your data without your knowledge.

Selling your data isn't, and will never be, our revenue model. And still, Yivi is free to use. Is there a catch? No there isn't! Only the organizations using Yivi pay for the services, ensuring Yivi remains free for you.
help.question_3: Who is behind the Yivi app?
help.answer_3_markdown:
The Privacy by Design Foundation is the non-profit organization behind Yivi. You might not be familiar with that name, but you’ve likely benefited from their vision if you care about privacy-first digital identity. The foundation is dedicated to developing secure, privacy-preserving technologies that put users in control of their data. They created Yivi to give everyone a way to identify themselves digitally—safely and selectively. 

 Caesar Groep, with decades of experience in IT innovation and infrastructure, makes sure Yivi works smoothly and securely. From the backend to the user interface, Caesar Groep ensures that every interaction with Yivi is seamless and trustworthy—anytime, anywhere.
help.question_4: How to use Yivi for logging onto a mobile website?

answer_4.step_1: Open the website on your mobile and select logging in with Yivi.
answer_4.step_2:
The Yivi app starts automatically.
Enter your PIN.
answer_4.step_3: Agree (or disagree) to disclose your personal data.
answer_4.step_4:
After disclosing you are logged in.
You can now use the website.

help.question_5: How to use Yivi for logging onto a website on my computer?

answer_5.step_1: Open the website on your computer and select 'login with Yivi'.
answer_5.step_2: Open the Yivi app on your mobile and enter your PIN.
answer_5.step_3: Start the QR code scanner in the Yivi app. Scan the QR code on the screen of your computer.
answer_5.step_4: Agree (or not) to disclose your personal data.
answer_5.step_5:
After disclosing you are logged in.
You can now use the website.

help.question_6: What to do if I lose my mobile?
help.answer_6_markdown:
If you lose your phone nobody can access your Yivi app as it's secured with your PIN code. Want to increase security? Add a recovery e-mail address during installation. This will allow you to remotely block the application. Ensuring nothing will happen when you lose your phone.

Haven't added a recovery address yet? Just go to MijnYivi to add it.
help.question_7: Can I install Yivi on multiple mobile devices?
help.answer_7: Yes, we even recommend doing so! Just download the app on multiple devices and load it with your personal data. If you lost one device you always have a backup.
help.question_8: Where is my Yivi data stored?
help.answer_8: All data stored in the Yivi app is only stored locally. There is no centralized data (or cloud) storage. This means that you're the only one who can access your data. You're in control and giving permission to share your data with online organisations. Deleted your data from the app? That means they're all gone, permanently. You're in full control of your data. Only you decide what you're sharing, and with whom.
help.question_9: What makes Yivi privacy-friendly and secure?
help.answer_9:
Giving people back control over their digital data is the mission of Yivi. What are you storing? What do you share? And with whom? Yivi empowers you to make that choice. With our app, you can decide what others learn about you. This data is shared from your phone with the requesting party, nobody else is part of that transaction. Not even Yivi.

Everything is stored securely on your phone, encrypted and behind a PIN code. There is no centralized data or cloud storage that contains your personal data. Lost your phone? Don't panic. Just remotely block your Yivi app. That prevents anyone from using your data without your knowledge.

The data that's loaded into Yivi is digitally signed by the supplier of the data. Proving its validity. This means that the requesting party can always be sure that the data you supplied is real.
help.question_10: Why does the data in the Yivi app have limited validity?
help.answer_10: The supplier of the data can determine what the validity period of the data is. So your data can expire. You will get a warning in the Yivi app if this happens. How long your data remains valid depends on the type of data. Your name and birthdate are valid for 5 years. Your address is just one year. You can always refresh your data, whenever you want. For instance by refreshing your age after your 18th birthday. That way you can directly show that you're older than 18.
help.answer_11:
The Yivi app has been developed in such a way that you and only you can see and use your personal data. Your personal data is only stored on your phone and nowhere else. We don't store your data in the cloud.

The Yivi app enables a website or shop to (cryptographically) verify that the data you disclosed is genuine.

The Yivi app discloses your data directly from your phone to the website. No one else can see that you're identifying yourself. Not even the organization behind Yivi.

When using Yivi, you agree with the [privacy policy](https://www.yivi.app/en/privacy).
help.send: Do you have other/more questions? Send an e-mail. It may take a couple of days before you get a reply.

reset_pin.explanation: We're sorry but the Yivi organisation does not have a copy of your PIN. If you wish to continue using Yivi, you will have to enter a new PIN and reload all data.

rooted_warning.title: Device unsafe
rooted_warning.explanation: The operating system on your device seems to be modified (Rooted/Jailbreak). Because of this, the safety of your data cannot be guaranteed.

secure_pin.title: Choose PIN
secure_pin.subtitle: A secure PIN has the following properties:

rules.must_not_asc_or_desc: Must not contain ascending nor descending keyboard patterns, like 12345
rules.not_abcab_nor_abcba: Must not contain the following keyboard patterns: abcba, abcab, like 12312, 12321, 13331
rules.must_contain_valid_subset: Must contain 5 adjacent numbers, that comply with the rules mentioned above

pairing.title: Extra safety check
pairing.instruction: Enter this verification code on the website for extra security.

unknown_session_type.title: Cancelled
unknown_session_type.explanation: The Yivi session that you started is not supported by the app.
